subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: After the Devils used their first pick to select Mike Hoeffel in the second round of the N.H.L. draft Saturday, Hoeffel will get the opportunity to become a teammate with the player he looked up to most.
snippet: After the Devils used their first pick to select Mike Hoeffel in the second round of the N.H.L. draft Saturday, Hoeffel will get the opportunity to become a teammate with the player he looked up to most.
